question: Mica is used in electrical appliances such as electric iron because mica is
option1: a good conductor of heat but a bad conductor of electricity
option2: a bad conductor of heat but a good conductor of electricity
option3: a good conductor of heat as well as electricity
option4: a bad conductor of heat as well as electricity
answer: a good conductor of heat but a bad conductor of electricity
